title: Greek roast chicken
ingredients: ['juice of 1 large orange', '4 tablespoons Dijon mustard', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '4 teaspoons dried Greek oregano', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '12 medium-sized potatoes, peeled and cut into 3cm pieces', '4 to 6 cloves garlic', '1 whole chicken']
